titleStmt.title: Englands mercies in the midst of miserys. Or, The poor-man's comfort in a time of trouble. To the tune of, Packingtons pound, or, Digbys arewell [sic]. Entred according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[onah]. Deacon, at the Angel without Newgate.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Poor England thy sorrows this many a year ..."
Place, date of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
